original_text: You belong to Christ, and he makes you brave. His love makes you strong. You are able to help one another because his Spirit is in you. You can be kind to each other, and you can forgive each other.
korean_text: 그러므로 그리스도 안에 무슨 권면이나 사랑의 무슨 위로나 성령의 무슨 교제나 긍휼이나 자비가 있거든

sentences.original_text: You are able to help one another
because his Spirit is in you
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그의 영이 너 안에 있기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: You can be kind to each other
and you can forgive each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 서로를 용서할 수 있다
